description: I can never get it to come on automatically. It's always in some weird limbo state where I have to turn it off and back on for it to activate.

Nov. 7, 2022
I don't understand why a roboust night color applet or 
application dosen't exist? 

The KDE software is all there and works in gamma etc. 
But does not change K color when set and apply.

Humans need this for their eyes! 

This is not optional. Redshift is a joke. 4500k at night??
And not adjustable! 
Need to be adjustable K color and manual time set. Period.

Works in fine Kubuntu and someone made a decent applet 
for mint (qredshift).

I love the ease of use of this app (other than the bug where it will not start automatically--ubuntu studio 22.10--, but it says it is on. As user above said, quick fix is to disable / enable on start).

Coming from f.use on windows this is a very pleasant ux tool.
If I power my computer during the night period, the colors are blueish like during the daytime, but the indicator says it is on. If I turn it off and then back on it works as advertised.
summary: No night colors when machine starts at night
